items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.
items.title: waiz3ple/fractionability: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.

items.content_html: A static website framework and vanilla JavaScript menu with associated HTML & CSS where you only have to adjust 3 height values in the JavaScript to add & remove menu & submenu items. Optionally integrates with Pure CSS framework. Responsive, mobile first & minimal/lightweight/fast!
items.title: cooperdozier/easy-em: A static website framework and vanilla JavaScript menu with associated HTML & CSS where you only have to adjust 3 height values in the JavaScript to add & remove menu & submenu items. Optionally integrates with Pure CSS framework. Responsive, mobile first & minimal/lightweight/fast!

items.content_html: Vulture.js is a lightweight, efficient, and highly customizable JavaScript library designed to validate forms effortlessly. It helps developers ensure data accuracy with minimal configuration while maintaining flexibility for complex use cases.
